dt: {bc}a horizontal main structural member (as in a building or bridge) that supports vertical loads and that consists of a single piece or of more than one piece bound together

et: {et_link|gird:1|gird:1} (in sense "to surround as with a belt, connect firmly") + {et_link|-er:2|-er:2}
shortdef: a horizontal main structural member (as in a building or bridge) that supports vertical loads and that consists of a single piece or of more than one piece bound together

dt: {bc}a girder with top and bottom flanges connected by a latticework web

shortdef: a girder with top and bottom flanges connected by a latticework web
